website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for making a wide variety of different shapes and sizes.
pros: They make a variety of gummies such as bears, stars, hearts, and shells
Trays are dishwasher safe and come clean easily
Large droppers are easy to use and mess-free
cons: Small gummy bear tray is harder to fill

customer_reviews.title: ... just received these trays and the silicone smell is super strong. I washed them but they still smell ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received these trays and the silicone smell is super strong. I washed them but they still smell like silicone. How do I get rid off the smell? Or I have to return these. Disappointed 😞 Update: I gave it a 4 star now that the seller told me to soak them in hot water for 2 hours which did help remove the smell. I just wish the trays came with the smell already removed by the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: JYC

customer_reviews.title: Great for making Gummies
customer_reviews.text: We made homemade elderberry gummies from the molds and the kids loved them! They loved having all the fun shapes to choose from. Making them was easy with the molds. I didn't need anything to prevent from sticking they popped right out. The only thing that was a bit difficult was transferring the molds to the fridge after the syrup was in them because they were pretty wobbly but that is to be expected. Next time I will make sure to put them on a tray before pouring for easy transfer. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Justine Arbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent molds, soft and durable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent molds, soft and durable. I use them for making gelatin candies. The candies come off nice and easy. Pipettes are very helpful addition. Very easy to use even for the kids. We enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Kap

customer_reviews.title: These are so awesome! Love that I got a 5 pack for ...
customer_reviews.text: These are so awesome! Love that I got a 5 pack for the price! Used them for chocolate molds and gummy bears, fairly easy to get them out, the only one that was a touch challenging was the star, but if you're careful its fine! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I bought these molds b/c I am doing the Keto diet. I make Keto gummy bears & sugar free chocolates & fat bombs in them. They dont have to be greased or anything. And the items pop right out. I love them. They are easy to clean. The dropper that comes with it is perfect for filling the molds, no mess.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and Clean
customer_reviews.text: The product was a hit! Although I thought they were bigger in length and width, they worked quite fine. I like how easy the are to clean. I had a bit of trouble with using the dropper but realized if I held it down after filling it the contents did not spew out but if I made the mistake and held it sideways everything went flying. The molds are a bit hard to lift when filled so I would encourage individuals to put them on a cutting board or place mat before filling them and then transfer to the refrigerator either on the mat or cutting board or pulling mold off inside the refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Ice Pop Lover

customer_reviews.title: Used for homemade gummy bears and chocolates
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, price, easy to use and clean, don't have to be a rocket scientist or any type of scientist to use this. We have made ice-cubes, gummy bears and candy with this....worked great for all. May consider adding more of these to our collection. Makes me look like a professional.
customer_reviews.author: g k

customer_reviews.title: Quick Return and Refund Process for defective item!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and was highly disappointed when one of the molds was defective. I have been using ice cube trays when making candy and it just wasn't working. So I was excited when I found these and ordered them. However, since the one was defective I needed to return them. I must say the refund process was painless and quick. Do not hesitate to order this product, because when they did come they looked like a good quality product and I plan to purchase them again and try them out. Also, with returning the item and requesting a refund, there was no hesitation on the part of the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Bartley-Dixson

customer_reviews.title: These work great for making sugar free gummies on a KETO lifestyle!
customer_reviews.text: I use these to make sugar free gummies. They work great! And because the shapes are so cute, I can even get my picky grandson to eat them. I rarely get a "sweet tooth" on my keto style of eating, but when I do, it's so easy to mix up a little SF jello, gelatin and hot water, squeeze into the molds with the eyedropper. Then set them in the fridge for a few minutes. Easy peasy! Only takes a few minutes! I spray lightly every few uses with a cooking spray and they release easily. I wash them in the dishwasher top rack.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Dawn

customer_reviews.title: I need more food!
customer_reviews.text: So these are good for little bites on the go, for me I love my food and I feel like i have to have ten of these! I do not think these are easy to clean, they have these little crevices and then my ptsd comes back from all those years of cleaning nipples from the breastfeeding days. They are very cute, love the design and are very kid proof (test by a four and seven year old pulling on them and running in opposite directions because they both wanted yellow).
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great for making gummis... but nervous about seashells
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but: 1. The resultant gummi bears seem TINY. Probably not worth docking a star for, since they do give the exact dimension, but... be aware these little guys seem like half the size of what you think of as a Gummi Bear. 2. I'm actually going to throw the seashell tray away. The seashell shaped gummis made from this seem like the perfect size to be a choking hazard. In fact I had a little scare where I felt like I also had one go down the wrong pipe. I wouldn't make any candies for kids using that one, especially if the candies or gummis come out firm or hard.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I love them and will be ordering more!! They pop out so easily and clean up is a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Joslyn

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: The bears are teeny teeny weeny tiny. About 6 -8 will fit in a teaspoon . The hearts are a wee bit bigger. The shells & stars are more reasonably sized. The dropper might be good for chocolate but useless with jellos.
customer_reviews.author: Modesto Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Great for gummies!
customer_reviews.text: Heat your favorite juices to 100°F and add a bunch of gelatin powder, then transfer to these molds using provide droppers. The only challenge is... the small bear molds are actual gummy-bear size and kind of a pain. The shells and stars are a much bigger hit with my two-year-old.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Anglemyer

customer_reviews.title: Great for making gummy bears, droppers could be better
customer_reviews.text: The kids absolutely loved this. It's flexible, easy to clean, the molds seems to be decent quality -- makes a good fun toy for making gummy bears. Only complaint is that the bears are quite small, the stars, shells, etc... are fine but the bears are a little bit on the smaller size and the droppers are of a lower quality.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyH

customer_reviews.title: Quality mold, easy to fill with dropper, great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My daughter loved using them for ice cubes at her “tea parties”. The heart and gummy bear shapes are small, a little smaller than a dime while the stars and shell shapes are about the size of a quarter maybe slightly larger. They are high quality molds, the droppers included makes them SUPER easy to use. Washed well and releases jello and ice easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so looking forward to these. They shipped quickly but your jello sticks to the mold.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Henlsey

customer_reviews.title: work really well!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I bought them to make maple candies and they come out really well. I gave them 4 stars for easy to clean because the star design is a little hard to clean out because of the design, but otherwise they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Thesun121

customer_reviews.title: Very flexible and does not smell bad.
customer_reviews.text: I like that the molds are flexible and they don’t stink. They are from China but thank God they don’t stink and I will keep them. I have other molds like this that I really love and this is a great addition.( I had ordered molds from another seller that were from China as well and they smelled so bad)
customer_reviews.author: Knitter

customer_reviews.title: Not just for candy....
customer_reviews.text: I bought these molds to use with Liquid Sculpy Clay, to make fake decorations for a cake for a theatrical production. The pieces came out very easily, and the detail they create is great! They also clean very easily (as I discovered when I overcooked my clay and it exploded all over the molds). Easy to use, easy to clean, great for things other than candy/chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Skellerman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality silicone molds at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I love these little molds for making gummies. They are a great value for what you get, they clean super easy and getting the gummies out is a snap. No complaints, I've bought these multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: NastyBTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Hold up great. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I have made gummies 3 different ways in these. Never using an oil or cornstarch to release the candy. They come out perfectly everytime. The bears are small but work great for vitamin gummies. The hearts are adorable. The stars and shellls are a bit big for gummies but great for jello jigglers. Well made. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: JLN7880

customer_reviews.title: Bear molds are VERY small!
customer_reviews.text: The shell and star molds are of a good size. They release gummy candies without any sticking. However you should know that the bear molds (there are two) are VERY small. They produce gummy bears that are even smaller than the mini gummy bears you can buy in the store. For me, they are useless.
customer_reviews.author: Lois N

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to remove gummies
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the molds for gummies so far. The molds are a little hard to clean all the crevices but it is super easy to remove the gummies without even using cooking spray first. I have another silicone mold that is difficult to remove gummies from because it is harder material, I will only use that for chocolates or similar now.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good, can be hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: Passed the pinch test, bears are slightly smaller than traditional but the functionality and purpose is great. I use them for keto gummies and have never had a problem with sticking. Sometimes pieces of food get stuck in the little crevices
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Emily

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: The ones shaped like stars are a little hard to remove because there’s so much detail of them. The big ones shaped like scallops pop right out. I never used the ones that had the smaller ships because they didn’t work for what I was making.
customer_reviews.author: meheffe

customer_reviews.title: I'm the candy maker lol friends loved the way they came out
customer_reviews.text: Made 25 lbs of sugar into candies .....I'm so in love with these molds 💕💕💕💕
customer_reviews.author: nina

customer_reviews.title: Not for jello..
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be awesome for making jello and little candies. My son wanted jello. He asked about using these they were the worst to get the jello out when it were ready.. Definitely would not recommend for jello. Maybe for something that hardens but not anything like jello.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: not great, but works
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set of molds mostly for the gummy bears, but while the molds look like they are terribly cute, the actual outcome isn't that pretty. The little bears look skinny and not as detailed as the mold would suggest. Still works well though.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: They were easy to use. I made homemade gummies and the little droppers worked great to get the gel into the molds. I popped them in the dishwasher afterwards and they cleaned up with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate Molds
customer_reviews.text: My young daughter used these molds for making gummy bears. It was easy for her to use the dropper. When the gummy bears became solid, the bears were easy to remove from the molds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the spend
customer_reviews.text: Too small for the use intended. Too much work for too little bears or stars etc
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, quality questionable
customer_reviews.text: Cool product but one of the molds came in damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Gina D

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Ehhh...the shell and star molds are great, but the gummy bear ones are so small, you hardly get anything out. Not even worth making those again. I'll just keep using the star and shell ones and toss the other two.
customer_reviews.author: MEGAN B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but tiny bears.
customer_reviews.text: Made gummies with them. My 3 yo had a fun time using the dropper to fill the holes. Yes it was slightly messy. These trays are fun and easy to use. I would prefer bigger bear gummies, they’re quite tiny. The others are very big and I think could be smaller. That’s a preference so I’m still rating 5s
customer_reviews.author: KStans

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these molds! I’ve made little chocolates in them. They are easy to fill with the dropper that’s included and the candy pops out very easily. They are dishwasher safe and clean easily!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Missing 1! Damaged dropper!
customer_reviews.text: Only received 4 molds NOT 5. Description wrong? Or mistake? Otherwise they seem like they will work fine for us! Also, one dropper is cracked and unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Need to be bigger
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, but it would be nice if the sizes of the holes were a bit bigger. Easy to clean and use though.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Neis

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for gummies, chocolates, etc. 4 stars because it's a little bit difficult to clean them. The droppers it comes with are really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Proctor5

customer_reviews.title: Check Sizes Carefully!
customer_reviews.text: FYI....Be sure to check the measurements for the tray sizes....I afraid I did not and now own molds that are way to small for my needs. I would send them back...however, the return postage is over half the price of the item.
customer_reviews.author: just me 123

customer_reviews.title: Dont use the gummy bears molds
customer_reviews.text: We tried the gumy bears molds and the clam shells and the gummies were very hard to get out. Will not use again. Will use the others bigger molds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are cute and fun and well made!
customer_reviews.text: Have had so much fun with these little guys. The grandkids love them. Make jello snacks and use fruit juice. The kiddos like to pick the color and flavor. I don't feel bad letting them snack! Very easy to clean and store. Have some fun!
customer_reviews.author: joe ard

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Comes with a dropper which is very handy, I put Grandsons organic juice in them and always have them on hand, I also put his organic yogurt in them which you have to do with a butter knife then scrape off excess
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: Very small molds
customer_reviews.text: Way too small! They looked bigger in the picture. My fault for not looking at the dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: awesome mom

customer_reviews.title: I like these!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these! They work great. I’ve used them several times for homemade gummies and they are easy to pop out and have endured the manipulation. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Hamster Girl

customer_reviews.title: fun shapes
customer_reviews.text: These molds were so easy to pop the gummies and chocolates out of. The kids loved the bears.
customer_reviews.author: cindyB

customer_reviews.title: Great candy molds!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and clean, and a good variety of sizes. Perfect for making gummies.
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: Comes with 2 gummy bear trays??
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I thought, not practical for chocolates, child size
customer_reviews.author: Cecile Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN G0 BUY SOMEWERE ELSE
customer_reviews.text: My molds were all cut up at first I thought it was my dog but I looked at the cuts and it wasn't and they had already been used there was some sticky residue on it
customer_reviews.author: Kourtney

customer_reviews.title: A little tinier than they thought they would be
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun product although a little bit tinier than I thought they were
customer_reviews.author: Risktkr

customer_reviews.title: Versatile group of molds
customer_reviews.text: Cleanup is generally no issue but can be fussy if something does stick. Small sizes are fun for chocolate, larger molds are nice for dog treats and bath bombs.
customer_reviews.author: Suzade

customer_reviews.title: Great but gummy bear molds are small and odd.
customer_reviews.text: Three of these are great molds but the gummy bear molds were too small and have a weird shape. The stars, shells, and hearts are all great though.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I made elderberry gummies with these, came out nice and kids loved them
customer_reviews.author: OR

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't beat this product. I was very surprised with how much product I received.
customer_reviews.author: Tebs

customer_reviews.title: Shallow bear mold great otherwise
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. The bear mold is more shallow than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette Short

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect to make oil pulling tabs into cute shapes only downside is that its so hard to clean in all the little grooves.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are great I got them to make gummy worms with out the harmful ingredients and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but bears and hearts are TINY
customer_reviews.text: These are super mini bears and hearts FYI. Otherwise, it's easy to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: tk8674

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my daughter. She absolutely loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Mellee

customer_reviews.title: Makes great gummys
customer_reviews.text: I love the 3 larger molds! Easy to fill, unmold and clean. The bear shaped mold is a little hard to unmold and very hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: lioness08332

customer_reviews.title: i won't say easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: but they do clean pretty well in a dishwasher. As a mold, the gummies come out very easily, which was my main concern, especially w the bears, because they are "Haribo-size". They drop out nicely with a bit of mold-twisting, once set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for homemade gummies
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Is smaller than I expected as I wanted it to make homemade chocolates but works great for gummies and homemade dog treats.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya murray

customer_reviews.title: so easy
customer_reviews.text: This was a good deal. The molds are sturdy, easy to fill with droppers and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Michael J.

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to spray the molds with cooking spray before using ; I wouldn’t recommend using starch
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that there are so many gummies to be made! The droppers aren’t really efficient; if you’re not careful the liquid will squirt out before you have a chance to get it into your mold.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer E Graham

customer_reviews.title: Kids love
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The dropper makes it so much easier for my kids to use it. The only complaint is I wish the bears was bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functional and fun
customer_reviews.text: We used these to make gummies with my kids. They were easy to pop out and fill. Cleaning was ok - hot water and a scrubber did the job. Lots of different options for shapes which was great - everyone got their own gummy “shape” to create.
customer_reviews.author: Vagablond

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a problem with these molds, great for soap embeds
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: Comes with droppers that make filling smaller forms easy and neat. Great product and happy to recommend to anyone who need to make small, decorative items.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Sweet spot
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product great making candies my husband can eat. He has trouble swallowing since he in recovery from cancer but now he eat this soft candies. Thank you so much ❤️
customer_reviews.author: nicole scott

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and quality! Used them multiple times! The application tubes are great for precision as well and hold liquids very well.
customer_reviews.author: Dalia Khalaf

customer_reviews.title: bears should be bigger
customer_reviews.text: The gummy bear containers are extremely tiny so not easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thickness
customer_reviews.text: We love these molds and the price are you kidding me.. way better than the molds I payed way more for from hobby lobby
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice selection
customer_reviews.text: Make gummi's with these. The different sizes were a nice touch. Easy to poke them out of the molds. Cleaned up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Randy S. Rusnak

customer_reviews.title: Great  price and  service
customer_reviews.text: My sister love that thank you very much she uses it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged silicone
customer_reviews.text: This was a pretty good deal, however the start mold came damaged with a hole through it.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I use these to make gummy bears. The molds are easy release, the Bears pop right out. Super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: linda ham

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I like these molds EXCEPT for the 2 teddy bears ones....they are too tiny to do anything with. I thought I was getting a great deal with this package, but now have to find/buy substitute for those small ones
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting all of the molds to be the ...
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting all of the molds to be the larger size, that may have been my fault though. I must not have been paying attention after looking at so many!
customer_reviews.author: packin Gramma

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! Very durable but a lot smaller than I thought they’d be. Great for chocolate and fruit snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Eversman

customer_reviews.title: Easy and simple
customer_reviews.text: I like these molds... I made some fat bomb candy and they worked well, even the dropper kept me from making a mess.. not much else to say but that they’re worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: C. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Silicone Candy Molds
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute. I used the bear and heart for Valentine's Day for my grandchildren. I liked the heart because it was deep. Easy to clean. Will definitely use again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Used them to make gummy bears. Easy to clean and love the droppers. Will try chocolate in them too. Very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Deb McNulty

customer_reviews.title: This runs small
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty small. Little Gummy Bears are extremely small.
customer_reviews.author: Angel K.

customer_reviews.title: Great gummy molds
customer_reviews.text: Loved these molds didnt get the dropper with them though as it shows but I still love them for gummies.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie bennett

customer_reviews.title: Definitely easy to remove
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for tiny wax melts!! Easy to remove with out damage!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon1953

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Tee tiny treats
customer_reviews.text: I've only used one so far and I like it. These are my first silicon molds. I did expect a variety of sizes with the shapes, from large to the tee tiny gummi bears but they are all relatively small. However, they are still functional and deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product. I should have read the dimensions a ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product. I should have read the dimensions a little better cause the hearts and bears were smaller than I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: lwelch

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I dont use nonstick for gummies and they still come out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas wozniak

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: work great, larger ones a little hard to get out of
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Hard to remove and to clean
customer_reviews.text: It was very entertaining for my 3 year old but it os super hard to get the gummies out, specially the brears also very complicated to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Monica R.

customer_reviews.title: In love!
customer_reviews.text: We love these! We made root beer candies with the little bears.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for a friend, and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Compton

customer_reviews.title: Did their job
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't really easy to gummy bears mold but the others were easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Cynia Young

customer_reviews.title: Weird fibers embedded in one of the molds
customer_reviews.text: These weird fibers (in photos) are in this one. I’m not comfortable using it. The other pack I got was normal.
customer_reviews.author: R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gummy bear mold!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this item. The gummy bear mold works great for hot wax!
customer_reviews.author: Des

customer_reviews.title: Bears are fragile! Remove carefully.
customer_reviews.text: They were great. But bear mold weren’t easy to remove without breaking arms or legs... even head! Hey, we had fun making jellos out of those to attempt make our own healthy candies
customer_reviews.author: GoAskMoonLisa

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT for making wax samples for my customers. The wax comes out very easily. The only reason I gave the “east to clean” 3 stars is because the droppers are hard to clean-but it’s wax so...
customer_reviews.author: Joshua A

customer_reviews.title: Missing one mold.
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with the star mold missing. The gummy bear molds are TINY they are smaller than they look in pictures. Not very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: very durable and flexible
customer_reviews.text: I really loved them, still learning how to make my candy but they were easy to use compared to plastic molds.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Itty bitty bears
customer_reviews.text: The droppers suck but the molds are great. Bears are super tiny i suggest freezing the gummies or whatever you are molding for easier release. Tiny mold equals super tiny arms and feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Poe

product_meta.title: Chocolate Molds Gummy Molds Silicone - Candy Mold and Silicone Ice Cube Tray Nonstick Including Hearts, Stars, Shells
feature_bullets: ❤️ ENJOY A FULL VALUE SET: Making 50 bear gummies, 15 stars, shells and 55 small hearts at a time. Candy, gummies, chocolates, mints, fudge, small cakes, jell-o, ice cubes, crayon melts and all you could creative
❤️ MULTI PURPOSE: Use for candy molds, chocolate molds, cake molds, ice cube tray, crayon mold and jelly mold or as a cake topper, cake decorating
❤️ PREMIUM SILICONE MOLDS: 100% food grade silicone, BPA free, heat-resistant temperature is -104℉ to 446℉ (-40℃ to 230℃), safe for use in the oven, freezer, microwave and dishwasher
❤️ NON-STICK & EASY REALEASE: Flexible and easy to clean, making these cute silicone candy molds with your kids, I believe kids will love it when it pop out with good detail shape
